```{r boxplot, echo=FALSE}
#| fig.cap=""
                   
box<- ggplot(data) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = polltype, 
                 y = visits, 
                 group = polltype, 
                 color = polltype
                 )
             ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    name = 'Number of Flower Visits'
  )+
  scale_x_discrete(
    name = 'Pollinator Type'
    )+
  theme_classic(base_size = 10) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

box

```
